alert.note: Alert for Potter; Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 18 at 8:56PM CDT until May 18 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN RANDALL AND SOUTHEASTERN POTTER COUNTIES... At 856 PM CDT, two severe thunderstorms, the first located 6 miles west of Mescalero Park and the second located 7 miles east of Lake Tanglewood, were moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Amarillo, Canyon, Lake Tanglewood, Mescalero Park and Timbercreek Canyon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
